item.title: Differential Gene Expression Analysis
item.description: Disclaimer: This tutorial was originally written on April 01, 2019. Introduction In a previous tutorial, we showed you how to download and process RNA-seq FASTQ files for read alignment on a reference sequence, and for read quantification. In this tutorial, we show you how to conduct Differential Gene Expression (DGE) analysis using the DESeq2, edgeR, and limma package. We set our working directory to the tuto folder created in our first tutorial.
